title: Card Potluck
desc:
Post 2411
- Everyone puts in a number of cards that they are willing to bet, making sure to leave at least 3 cards in their hand, max 6.
 - Each card bid is a ticket's worth.
- At the end of your next turn, the host sums up all of the tickets and pulls one out of a computer's hat. That person gets to randomly distribute as many cards as they bid. Any losers also gain **Card Shards** equal to 1.5 times the amount they bid, rounded down.
 - If you do not bid, you are exempt from the potluck. However, if you have no more than 3 cards, you can still draw cards from the potluck.
